column1: Basically, there are two types of black people and black people are actually more racist because they hate the other type of black people. Every time the one type wants to have a good time, then the other type comes in and makes a real mess.
It was kind of hard to hear.
You wanna go to the beach?
Hes got to come out sometime. To go to the bathroom.
What are you guys talking about?
Do you think we should go ?
I have a hoop in my driveway.
So are you jealous cause theres another girl around?
